targets.query: SELECT "run_number" FROM "dunedaq.rcif.opmon.RunInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "run_number" >0 AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_total_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_msg_received_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_inhibited_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_paused_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_queue_timeout_expired_err_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tc_received_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tc_ignored_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tds_created_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tds_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tds_dropped_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tds_failed_bitword_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tds_cleared_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tds_created_tc_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tds_sent_tc_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tds_dropped_tc_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tds_failed_bitword_tc_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tds_cleared_tc_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TCProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("received_events_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.HSISourceModelInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tcs_made_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.HSISourceModelInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tcs_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.HSISourceModelInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tcs_dropped_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.HSISourceModelInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tc_made_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.RandomTCMakerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tc_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.RandomTCMakerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tc_failed_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.RandomTCMakerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tc_made_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.CustomTCMakerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tp_received_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TPProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "element"=~/${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("ta_made_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TPProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "element"=~/${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("ta_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TPProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "element"=~/${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("ta_failed_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TPProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "element"=~/${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("ta_received_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TAProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "element"=~/${ta_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tc_made_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TAProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "element"=~/${ta_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tc_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TAProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "element"=~/${ta_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tc_failed_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.TAProcessorInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "element"=~/${ta_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("lc_klive") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("lc_kpaused") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("lc_kdead") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("rate_payloads_consumed")*1000 FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element"

SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.LatencyBufferInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element" fill(null)

SELECT sum("data") FROM ( SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.LatencyBufferInfo" WHERE  "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element" fill(null) ) GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_buffer_cleanups")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads_overwritten")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("tot_request_response_time")/sum("num_requests_handled") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("tot_request_response_time")/sum("num_requests_handled") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "element", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT min("min_request_response_time") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT max("max_request_response_time") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("num_requests_waiting") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_found")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_delayed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_bad")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_old_window")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_timed_out")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_uncategorized")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_buffer_cleanups")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads_overwritten")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_found")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_delayed")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_bad")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_old_window")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_timed_out")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_uncategorized")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${element}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SELECT "element" FROM (SELECT "rate_payloads_consumed", "element" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "subelement" =~ /T[^P]Processor/ AND $timeFilter)
list.label: Trigger elements
list.name: element
list.query: SELECT "element" FROM (SELECT "rate_payloads_consumed", "element" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "subelement" =~ /T[^P]Processor/ AND $timeFilter)
